about_the_game:
Star Battles: All Alone in the Black Space Map Pack

This collection of stunning maps includes 12 brand new scenes of space and is ideal for ship fights and the discovery of lost civilizations in your science fiction/science fantasy campaign. Each map includes a square grid and a hex grid preset for you, and as well as the asset so you can set your own grid, letting you use these maps with any game system.
Star Battles:  All Alone in the Black  Space Map Pack includes:
  • Worlds and moons alone in the blackness of space
  • Beautiful planets orbiting distant stars
  • Comets near planets racing through the void
  • A violet nebula and a purple ringed world
  • Stunning detail on every map, each created to be 4,000 pixels wide
Give your game a stunning background for the most epic of battles!
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Dale McCoy
